eligibility.description:
The GG23 Regen Coordination Global round is an innovative impact-driven funding round designed to support regenerative finance (ReFi) networks that have demonstrated meaningful contributions to the ecosystem. Following on from the GG21 Genesis Round, this round brings together ReFi DAO, GreenPill Network, and other Regen Coordination partner networks to support a global movement of regenerative communities leveraging Web3 for real-world impact and addressing local needs.

Learn more at ðŸ‘‰ regencoordination.xyz

requirements.requirement: Complete Activity and Output reporting in KarmaGAP by application deadline.
Have active goals, plans, objectives or milestones for this year (and detail them in this application).
